text: <@U07MJH1HEG7> Unfortunately not. For now, you'll have to create a new chatflow for mobile chat
We'll keep this use case in mind for future releases!
Okay thanks for letting me know!

Hey folks, how's everything going so far? We'd love to hear any feedback, questions, or updates you might have as you implement the SDK. Feel free to drop a message here if anything comes up. Thanks for being part of the beta. :raised_hands:

Hi there Eric! Just dropping this here for tomorrow. I seem to be running into this error on Android. Wanted to see if you could point me in the right direction. I'm able to init the `HubSpotManager`  and open the chat. Could this maybe be a misconfiguration with the chat flow?
Figured it out! Forgot to set the `defaultChatFlow` variable in the `HubSpot-info.json`  :sweat_smile:
